name: gameoflife
description: Conway's game of life made in React

scripts.build:scripts: browserify src/main.js -x react -x react-dom -x bootstrap -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ syntax-class-properties transform-class-properties ] ] -o dist/scripts/main.js
scripts.build:vendor: browserify -r react -r react-dom -r bootstrap -o dist/scripts/bundle.js && css-bundler node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css dist/css/bundle.css && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css.map dist/css/bootstrap.min.css.map
scripts.build: npm run cleanup && npm run setupfolder && npm run build:vendor && npm run build:html && npm run build:scripts && npm run build:styles
scripts.start: npm run build && run-p watch:* server

author: Greg Smith
